tools.name: browser_navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL in the browser

new_tab.description: Whether to open in a new tab

tools.name: browser_click
tools.description: Click an element on the page by its index

index.description: The index of the link or element to click (from browser_get_state)

new_tab.description: Whether to open any resulting navigation in a new tab

tools.name: browser_type
tools.description: Type text into an input field

index.description: The index of the input element (from browser_get_state)

tools.name: browser_get_state
tools.description: Get the current state of the page including all interactive elements

include_screenshot.description: Whether to include a screenshot of the current page

tools.name: browser_extract_content
tools.description: Extract structured content from the current page based on a query

query.description: What information to extract from the page

extract_links.description: Whether to include links in the extraction

tools.name: browser_go_back
tools.description: Go back to the previous page

tab_id.description: 4 Character Tab ID of the tab to switch to
4 Character Tab ID of the tab to close

tools.name: retry_with_browser_use_agent
tools.description: Retry a task using the browser-use agent. Only use this as a last resort if you fail to interact with a page multiple times.

task.description: The high-level goal and detailed step-by-step description of the task the AI browser agent needs to attempt, along with any relevant data needed to complete the task and info about previous attempts.

max_steps.description: Maximum number of steps an agent can take.

model.description: LLM model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, claude-3-opus-20240229)

allowed_domains.description: List of domains the agent is allowed to visit (security feature)

use_vision.description: Whether to use vision capabilities (screenshots) for the agent

tools.name: browser_list_sessions
tools.description: List all active browser sessions with their details and last activity time

tools.name: browser_close_session
tools.description: Close a specific browser session by its ID

session_id.description: The browser session ID to close (get from browser_list_sessions)

tools.name: browser_close_all
tools.description: Close all active browser sessions and clean up resources
